bibl.title: Hellenistic Egypt. Monarchy, Society, Economy, Culture. Edited with an Introduction by Roger S. BAGNALL.
bibl.note: Reproduction (en version anglaise, légèrement remaniée) de 19 articles (1973-1999). - Pp. xix-xx: J.B., Foreword; - 1-12: R.S.B., Introduction. Jean Bingen and the Currents of Ptolemaic History; - 279-289: J.B., Conclusion; - 290-298: Bibliography; - 299-302: General Index; - 303: Index of Passages Cited. - Également distribué par: Edinburgh, Edinburgh University Press, 2007. ISBN 0-7486-1578-0 (hbk) / 0-7486-1579-7 (pbk). £60 (hbk) / £19.99 (pbk).
bibl.seg: BINGEN Jean, Hellenistic Egypt. Monarchy, Society, Economy, Culture. Edited with an Introduction by Roger S. BAGNALL. (Hellenistic Culture and Society. 49.)
Berkeley - Los Angeles - London, University of California Press, 2007, 8°, xiv-363 pp. ISBN 978-0-520-25141-0 (hbk) / 978-0-520-25142-7 (pbk). $70 (hbk) / $25.95 (pbk).

Reproduction (en version anglaise, légèrement remaniée) de 19 articles (1973-1999). - Pp. xix-xx: J.B., Foreword; - 1-12: R.S.B., Introduction. Jean Bingen and the Currents of Ptolemaic History; - 279-289: J.B., Conclusion; - 290-298: Bibliography; - 299-302: General Index; - 303: Index of Passages Cited. - Également distribué par: Edinburgh, Edinburgh University Press, 2007. ISBN 0-7486-1578-0 (hbk) / 0-7486-1579-7 (pbk). £60 (hbk) / £19.99 (pbk).

C.R. par John Bauschatz, BMCRev < http://ccat.sas.upenn.edu/bmcr/2007/2007-10-01.html >. - John Whitehorne, BASP 44 (2007) pp. 253-256. - Bernard Boyaval, BibO 66 (2009) coll. 122-123. - Sitta von Reden, Gnomon 82 (2010) pp. 523-527.
